channel.title: Working barrage?
channel.description: hey guyz does any1 a source that has barrage working like it freezes npc and players? im having a bad time. when every i dl source they have some gliteches plzzzzzzz some1 help me!

item.title: Working barrage?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Deltas barrage is glitched. It does freeze. The only time it does not freeze is:

  1. If you are already attacking someone
  2. You click attack (if in wild) or follow on a player

And it does not freeze NPCs but there might be a way to make that happen, i just never looked into it yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Working barrage?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you mean working barrage as just in freezing, believe it or not try a czar server. Although it really doesn’t have a delay and all, it freezes just fine on players.

Read full topic

item.title: Working barrage?
item.dc:creator: @n0_limit_k0 n0_limit_k0
item.description:
@n0_limit_k0 wrote:

my barrage is not working the source i have is delta and i’ev looked every. where some ppl say change the time by finding the magic spell.

here is the code

public int getFreezeTimer(int spell) { if (spell == 12861) { return 10000; } if (spell == 12881) { return 20000; } if (spell == 12871) { return 30000; } if (spell == 12891) { return 40000; } if (spell == 1572) { return 10000; } if (spell == 1582) { return 20000; } if (spell == 1592) { return 30000; } return 30; } public boolean Projectile(int spell) { if (spell == 12939) { return false; } if (spell == 12987) { return false; } if (spell == 12901) { return false; } if (spell == 12861) { return false; } if (spell == 12951) { return false; } if (spell == 12999) { return false; } if (spell == 12911) { return false; } if (spell == 12871) { return false; } if (spell == 12963) { return false; } if (spell == 13011) { return false; } if (spell == 12919) { return false; } if (spell == 12881) { return false; } if (spell == 12975) { return false; } if (spell == 13023) { return false; } if (spell == 12929) { return false; } if (spell == 12891) { return false; } return true;

i’ev changed the timer to like 800000000 and it still did not work can you plz help me?

Read full topic
